message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than what the market typically offers. For this opportunity, I propose a price of $120. This includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive guide on how to use it effectively. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further!

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. Considering the product's worth is $150 to you, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105. This is my best offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. I'd like to propose a compromise at $115 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on the product while being mindful of your budget constraints. I'm confident this offer will be beneficial for both of us. Please let me know if this works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. Considering your previous offer of $120 and your current offer of $115, I'm willing to meet you halfway again at $110. This is my best offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to lower the price to $108 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering both the value I place on it and your budget. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement. Let me know if you're satisfied with this offer.
